description: Try our easy to follow Tortilla Chips With Black Bean Guacamole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Guacamole,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tortilla Chips With Black Bean Guacamole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch coriander, plus extra to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper.
Combine avocado, onion, tomato, lime juice, black beans and coriander in a bowl. Season to taste. Sprinkle with extra coriander to garnish.
Spread out tortilla triangles on prepared trays and spray with oil. Bake for 8 minutes or until crispy. Serve with black bean guacamole.
